credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Pendant
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered
description: Flat, shield-shaped pendant of white satin embroidered in gold and sequins. The pattern, identical on both sides, represents a monstrance with sprays of wheat at the sides, and a border of floral scrolls. Silk tufts at three corners. Loop of gold cord to hang.
name: Pendant
